CUFA

CIT - UNIVERSITY FACEBOOK ANALYZER

What is CUFA?

CUFA or CIT-University Facebook Analyzer is a web application that could retrieve data from the official Cebu Institute of Technology University Facebook pages and analyze the data of the specific Facebook pages. The web application features a dashboard that will display the key performance indicators from the Facebook page that is used by the Facebook page admin to show and determine the Facebook page’s performance and how individuals interact with their pages in general.

Download CUFA here!

Around the Web

CUFA

Home Page

Home Page of CUFA this page has all the basic information about CUFA, At the left side found in the navigation bar are the following such as the drop down and navigate button which the users can press to navigate and choose between the functional pages, About Us which shows the information about the developers of the project, Help button which has guides designed for new users to be able to use the project, and a Contact Us button which has the contact information of the developers

Page Performance

Shows the analytics of page performance of a selected page. On the top part of the page is the header of the application. The left side of the page is divided into two sections: the page navigator, which allows the user to navigate through the application's various pages, and the filter option, which allows the user to select the performance data of a specific page and the performance data of a specific time frame of a selected month. The main dashboard of the page is divided into three sections: page performance, post performance, and scorecard performance.The main dashboard visualization of data will change based on the Facebook page and Month selected in the filter option on the left side of the page. In the page performance section, display an overview of statistics of user engagement with the Facebook page. The post performance section displays statistics on the impression, reach, and engagement of the page's post. The overall progress of the selected Facebook page is displayed in the performance scorecard sections.

Page Comparison

Gives the user a complete picture of how the performance of each Facebook page compares. The user can also select only specific pages to compare, which can be two or more Facebook pages. Post and Response analysis is also shown in this page that displays the number of Posts in a week, Weekly Response Rate, Post per day and Average Response Time. Finally, the user can use the built-in Power BI function to export data from a specific visualization in Excel Format.

Post and Response Analysis

Displays the Response analysis and Post analysis section. In Response analysis this shows the average response time in minutes by week of the certain page, below is the Response rate scorecard which shows the specific rate that corresponds from the timeline above. Responds to the queries of the followers are shown in the left side section of the responses analysis and it’s recorded first messages. In Post Analysis this shows the bar graph of total number of posts in a week, a breakdown of days are shown on the left side and it’s specific post by day. For Good Visualization of a specific post below the timeline is the Facebook Post, In this section users can visually see the posts in the specific page, Comments, Post Image also are shown. Lastly is the Post Insight the total number or summary of comments, reactions, shares, impressions, engagements, and Post reach of the page.
